text:
Hi there HubSpot developers, I'm trying to remove the font and font size options from a rich text module, I have came across this page showing how to do it using enabled features             <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields/rich-text-editor>
But When  try to paste this code on my fields.json I get an error
```{
  "name" : "description",
  "label" : "Description",
  "required" : false,
  "locked" : false,
  "type" : "richtext",
  "default" : null,
  "enabled_features" : ["bold","link","image"]
}```
can anybody help?
Is there a way to attach a hubdb table to a custom CRM object?
